name: Gun Control (gregorysoup)
description:
How long can you last a room full of zombies and spontaneous obstacles when the gun you've been given aims where it wants to?

In 'Gun Control' you are given a gun that decides where to aim, what it fires, how it fires and when it decides to reload. The only choice you get is when to fire it (assuming its ready).  Dodge around (dumb) zombies and obstacles  to survive as long as you can and hope that the next bullet you fire can help you beat your highscore!

Use WASD or the Arrow keys to move around and press left control or the left mouse button to fire your gun. (You can try aiming with the mouse but trust me, it won't help.)
